title: Welcome to the Guide Learning Hub
description: Complete the modules and assessment below to become a verified guide. Clearing the test is required to schedule your final interview.

trainingModules.title: Training Modules
trainingModules.description: Essential training materials to prepare you for assisting travelers with disabilities.
trainingModules.placeholder: Training content and videos will be available here soon.

assessment.title: Assessment Test
assessment.description: Test your knowledge based on the training modules. You must pass this test to proceed.
assessment.placeholder: The assessment test will become available after you review the training modules.

interview.title: Schedule Interview
interview.description: Once you pass the assessment, you can schedule your final interview with our team.
interview.placeholder: Interview scheduling will be enabled after you successfully pass the assessment.
